tool_description: Evaluates scalp health conditions including oiliness, dryness, sensitivity, dandruff, and other scalp issues to inform product selection.

oiliness_level.description: Scalp oil production: very dry, dry, normal, oily, or very oily

sensitivity_level.description: Scalp sensitivity: none, mild, moderate, or severe

dandruff_presence.description: Whether dandruff or flaking is present

itchiness_frequency.description: How often scalp itches: never, rarely, sometimes, often, or always

error_messages: Invalid oiliness level: Must be one of [very dry, dry, normal, oily, very oily]
Invalid sensitivity level: Must be one of [none, mild, moderate, severe]
Invalid itchiness frequency: Must be one of [never, rarely, sometimes, often, always]
usage: Assess your scalp's oil production, sensitivity to products, presence of dandruff or flaking, and frequency of itching to determine scalp health needs.

ingredient_preferences.description: Beneficial ingredients for this scalp type

ingredients_to_avoid.description: Ingredients that may irritate this scalp type
